episodes.synopsis: Journeying into a lava lake and a cenote, Iain Stewart shows how the heat that fuels volcanoes drives the most fundamental processes on the planet.
episodes.title: Volcano

episodes.synopsis: Iain Stewart rides in a Cold War fighter, gets his eyebrows singed in Siberia and discovers why Argentina is one of the stormiest places on Earth.
episodes.title: Atmosphere

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Iain Stewart shows how ice shaped our past and may threaten our future, examining a glacier in action by descending a frozen waterfall.
episodes.title: Ice

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Iain Stewart tells the story of the oceans: fierce waves, huge tidal bores, global currents and the future dangers of global warming.
episodes.title: Oceans

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Iain Stewart looks at the big picture of Earth's place in space, and how it has transformed into the unique planet we know.
episodes.title: Rare Earth

video.title: Earth: The Power of the Planet
video.synopsis: Hosted by geologist Iain Stewart, this documentary series explores how volcanoes, the ocean, the atmosphere and ice have shaped Earth.
